verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal.<s%>

<S%H7211>Reaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3189>Jahath;<s%> and <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H267>Ahumai<s%> and <S%H3855>Lahad.<s%> These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6882>Zorathites.<s%>

These were the sons of the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam:<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and <S%H3457>Ishma,<s%> and <S%H3031>Idbash;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H6753>Hazzelelponi;<s%>

and <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2364>Hushah.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H672>Ephrathah,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
<S%H806>Ashhur<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H2458>Helah<s%> and <S%H5292>Naarah.<s%>
<S%H5292>Naarah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H275>Ahuzzam,<s%> and <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> and <S%H8488>Temeni,<s%> and <S%H326>Haahashtari.<s%> These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5292>Naarah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2458>Helah<s%> were <S%H6889>Zereth,<s%> <S%H6714>Izhar,<s%> and <S%H869>Ethnan.<s%>
<S%H6976>Hakkoz<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6036>Anub,<s%> and <S%H6637>Zobebah,<s%> and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H316>Aharhel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2037>Harum.<s%>

<S%H3258>Jabez<s%> was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than his <S%H251>brothers:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H3258>Jabez,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Because I <S%H3205>bore<s%> him with <S%H6090>sorrow.<s%>"

<S%H3258>Jabez<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Oh <S%H518>that<s%> you would <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1288>indeed,<s%> and <S%H7235>enlarge<s%> my <S%H1366>border,<s%> and that your <S%H3027>hand<s%> might be with <S%H6213>me,<s%> and that you would keep me from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that it not be to my <S%H6087>sorrow!<s%>" <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>granted<s%> him that which he <S%H7592>requested.<s%>
<S%H3620>Chelub<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7746>Shuhah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4243>Mehir,<s%> who was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H850>Eshton.<s%>

<S%H850>Eshton<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of Beth <S%H1051>Rapha,<s%> and <S%H6454>Paseah,<s%> and <S%H8468>Tehinnah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of Ir <S%H5904>Nahash.<s%> These are the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7397>Recah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz:<s%> <S%H6274>Othniel,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6274>Othniel:<s%> <S%H2867>Hathath.<s%>

<S%H4587>Meonothai<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6084>Ophrah:<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1516>Ge<s%> <S%H2798>Harashim;<s%> for they were <S%H2791>craftsmen.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh:<s%> <S%H5900>Iru,<s%> <S%H425>Elah,<s%> and <S%H5277>Naam;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H425>Elah;<s%> and <S%H7073>Kenaz.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3094>Jehallelel:<s%> <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%> and <S%H2129>Ziphah,<s%> <S%H8493>Tiria,<s%> and <S%H840>Asarel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5834>Ezrah:<s%> <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> and <S%H4778>Mered,<s%> and <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H3210>Jalon;<s%> and she <S%H2029>bore<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> and <S%H8060>Shammai,<s%> and <S%H3431>Ishbah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H851>Eshtemoa.<s%>

His <S%H802>wife<s%> the <S%H3057>Jewess<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3382>Jered<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> and <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7755>Soco,<s%> and <S%H3354>Jekuthiel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2182>Zanoah.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1332>Bithiah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> whom <S%H4778>Mered<s%> <S%H3947>took.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H1940>Hodiah,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5163>Naham,<s%> were the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> the <S%H1636>Garmite,<s%> and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> the <S%H4602>Maacathite.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7889>Shimon:<s%> <S%H550>Amnon,<s%> and <S%H7441>Rinnah,<s%> Ben <S%H1135>Hanan,<s%> and <S%H8436>Tilon.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi:<s%> <S%H2105>Zoheth,<s%> and Ben <S%H2105>Zoheth.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7956>Shelah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6147>Er<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3922>Lecah,<s%> and <S%H3935>Laadah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah,<s%> and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of those who <S%H5656>worked<s%> fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H791>Ashbea;<s%>

and <S%H3137>Jokim,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3578>Cozeba,<s%> and <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> and <S%H8315>Saraph,<s%> who had <S%H1166>dominion<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H3433>Jashubilehem.<s%> The <S%H1697>records<s%> are <S%H6267>ancient.<s%>

These were the <S%H3335>potters,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5196>Netaim<s%> and <S%H1448>Gederah:<s%> there they <S%H3427>lived<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> for his <S%H4399>work.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H7586>Shaul;<s%>
<S%H7967>Shallum<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4017>Mibsam<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4927>Mishma<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4927>Mishma:<s%> <S%H2536>Hammuel<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> but his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7227>didn't<s%> have many <S%H1121>children,<s%> neither did all their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> like the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
They <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%> and <S%H2705>Hazarshual,<s%>
and at <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> and at <S%H6107>Ezem,<s%> and at <S%H8434>Tolad,<s%>
and at <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> and at <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%> and at <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%>

and at Beth <S%H1024>Marcaboth,<s%> and Hazar <S%H2702>Susim,<s%> and at Beth <S%H1011>Biri,<s%> and at <S%H8189>Shaaraim.<s%> These were their <S%H5892>cities<s%> to the <S%H4427>reign<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
Their <S%H2691>villages<s%> were <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> and <S%H5871>Ain,<s%> <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> and <S%H8507>Tochen,<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%>

and all their <S%H2691>villages<s%> that were <S%H5439>around<s%> the same <S%H5892>cities,<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal.<s%> These were their <S%H4186>habitations,<s%> and they have their <S%H3187>genealogy.<s%>
<S%H4877>Meshobab,<s%> and <S%H3230>Jamlech,<s%> and <S%H3144>Joshah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%>
and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3143>Joshibiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6221>Asiel,<s%>
and <S%H454>Elioenai,<s%> and <S%H3291>Jaakobah,<s%> and <S%H3439>Jeshohaiah,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah,<s%> and <S%H5717>Adiel,<s%> and <S%H3450>Jesimiel,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%>

and <S%H2124>Ziza<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8230>Shiphi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H438>Allon,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3042>Jedaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>â€”

these <S%H935>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> were <S%H5387>princes<s%> in their <S%H4940>families:<s%> and their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H7230>greatly.<s%>

They <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> even to the east <S%H4217>side<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for their <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

They <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7342>wide,<s%> and <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> and <S%H7961>peaceable;<s%> for those who <S%H3427>lived<s%> there <S%H6440>before<s%> were of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>

These <S%H3789>written<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and the <S%H4583>Meunim<s%> who were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2763>there,<s%> and destroyed them utterly to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H4829>place;<s%> because there was pasture there for their <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

Some of <S%H1121>them,<s%> even of the sons of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> having for their <S%H7218>captains<s%> <S%H6410>Pelatiah,<s%> and <S%H5294>Neariah,<s%> and <S%H7509>Rephaiah,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi.<s%>
They <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> who <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> and have <S%H3427>lived<s%> there to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
